channel.title: Killing monsters bug!
channel.description:
if i kill a monster with above 100 hp it says connection lost after i killed it :S
i give the monster 7500hp.. kill it finnaly after 5 minutes.. its says connection lost :eek:
any help?
also steel dragon connection lost after kill and got only 500hp

item.title: Killing monsters bug!
item.dc:creator: @indiankid indiankid
item.description:
@indiankid wrote:

umm you should lower thier hp… and try it and it might be cuz your server is lagging (caused by running too many programms at once, slow comp, slow internet.)

try lower the hp and see if it works, thats all i can say.

hope that helped.

Indian

Read full topic
